item.title: #7 Cyber Expert Michael Miora, SCADA Systems, the EPA, and the Banking Crisis
item.description: ROP-E7: HTML5 Audio ^ Austin and Nathan are joined by Michael Miora, one of the founding fathers of cybersecurity. Together they discuss a variety of topics including Michael’s career, new regulations from the EPA, and the effect that the current financial instability has on the world of cybersecurity. Be sure to listen in!
